entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call may be recorded for quality assurance. Please briefly describe the reason for your call.
Hi, I recently received a VeloFit exercise bike, and unfortunately, it arrived damaged.
I'm so sorry to hear that, could you please provide your order number so I can look into that for you?
Thank you. I see your order here. Could you describe the damage you observed?
Yes, the bike arrived, and I noticed a pretty significant **cracked frame** right away. Also, one of the wheels seems extremely **wobbly wheel**; it doesn't look safe to use at all.
I understand. It sounds like there was significant **shipping damage**. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. We strive for all our products to arrive in perfect condition.
It's really disappointing. I was excited to start using it.

Absolutely. I can certainly understand your frustration. To resolve this immediately, I'm happy to offer you a full refund for the bike. We can also arrange for the bike to be returned to us at no cost to you. I can email you a **free label** for the return shipment right away. Would that be acceptable?
Yes, that would be great. A full refund and a free return label would be perfect.

Excellent. I've already processed the full refund. You should see it reflected in your account within 7-10 business days, depending on your bank. And I just sent the return shipping label to the email address associated with your account. Please repackage the bike as best as you can and affix the label to the box.
Wonderful, thank you so much for your help! That was very easy.
You're very welcome. We appreciate your business with VeloFit. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thanks again for the quick resolution!
Have a great day, and thanks for calling VeloFit!
